items.desc: Utilizing prompt engineering technology to collect and analyze digital assets and on-chain data, and create AI reports with automatic event extraction.
Creating chatbot modules with various features and characters using Prompt Engineering.
Developing a report on the health and trustworthiness of coins, collecting and analyzing keywords related to news, social media, and economic indicators.
Participated in KOTRA's big data platform project, providing analysis of markets by country, promising overseas markets, and customized information for each company.
